content.rendered:
In an era when the seas teemed with terrifying beasts, monster hunters were celebrated as heroes—and Jacob Holland was held in the highest esteem. But when young Maisie Brumble hides on her legendary ship, Jacob finds an unexpected ally. Together, they embark on a grand journey through unknown waters to make history.

Directed By hris Williams

Writers: Chris Williams. Nell Benjamin. Mattson Tomlin

Stars: Karl Urban. Zaris-Angel Hator. Jared Harris
